title: Crime Stories 04.26.19
itunes:title: Crime Stories 04.26.19
description:
12 year old says she was starved and sexually abused for 8 years. Woman beats son because he wasn't a good enough lookout for thief grandma. Cold case solved by cigarette butt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
